title: Custom cookie name does not affect URL rewriting as stated in Servlet 3.0 ch.7.1.1
description: The bug report identifies an issue with the statement in Servlet 3.0 ch.7.1.1 that says custom cookie name affects URL rewriting. The description provides additional details about the problem.
OB: The current behavior does not follow the statement in Servlet 3.0 ch.7.1.1. The default 'jsessionid' is used for URL rewriting instead of the custom cookie name.
EB: Expected Behavior: When following the information in Servlet 3.0 ch.7.1.1, the Reload link should be 'http://localhost:8080/cookiename/index.jsp;MYSESSIONCOOKIE=658C60E714E9C7C833F4FDA366E0477F'
SR: Steps to Reproduce: 1. Deploy the attached 'cookiename.war' file. 2. Access 'http://localhost:8080/cookiename/'.
